document.full_text: between 130 and 250 people were missing and at least 15 appeared to be dead after a boat carrying refugees from libya capsized south of sicily early on wednesday, coast guard officials and aid workers said.
document.title: migrant boat sinks off italy, up to 250 missing
lines_and_colors: between 130 and 250 people were missing and at least 15 appeared to be dead after a boat carrying refugees from libya capsized south of sicily early on wednesday, coast guard officials and aid workers said.
